channel.title: Amulet = npc problem

item.title: Amulet = npc problem

item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

I just can’t figure out why it wont work.

if (playerEquipment[playerAmulet] == 552) { //Ghostspeak amulet
npcId = 92;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

pnpc doesn’t work either.
